body:
Hey! Uhh, quick question.. Can anyone make me a profile picture for my YouTube channel? I have had this one for about a year now and looking to change it. If you want an example, here is one.

https://gyazo.com/30e61ddfdbcb711d459ae83134700c1f
(Except with my skin)
If you can make me one, comment down and just message me on skype ( avicus.net/samueljacob9 )
You will get a shoutout in my next vid :D
EDIT: if you can, make the lines purple :]
